value.title: Convert data from HTML to Plain Text using Power Query for Power BI Table Visualization
value.excerpt: As we all know, Power BI table visualization does not support HTML generation. So, we need to convert our HTML text to Plain text.   With the help of Power Query function, we can easily remove HTML tags from the Text in Power Query. To implement that we need to use function HTML.table() in Power Query.
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/4UDynnPQpG4" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Copy a Visual as an Image on Clipboard in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, we will discuss the newly rolled out feature for Power BI Service – Copy visual as an Image.  In this video, we will be discussing the following features: • How to Copy a Visual as an Image for Power BI Report? • The properties and metadata which are copied using Copy a visual as an Image

value.title: DAX for Power BI - Calculate Cumulative Sum (Running Total) of Count in Power BI
value.excerpt: The cumulative total is also known as Running total and during this video, we will talk about how we can calculate a cumulative sum for request count using Power BI Dax measure in Power BI.  During this session, we will cover the following things: • Real-life example where we need Cumulative Sum 00:21

value.title: Draw Average Line in Power BI #Shorts
value.excerpt: Welcome to one more Power BI Trick and Tip. During this #Shorts we will learn how we can add an Average Line to our Power BI Graph. We can draw the Average Line for Power BI Cluster Column Chart, Cluster Bar Chart, Area Chart, and Line Chart. To add the Average Line the Procedure is very simple and easy.

value.excerpt: In this vLog, we will learn, how we can sort a tale using multiple columns for the table visualization in Power BI.  This feature has been rolled out in March 2020 Power BI Desktop Update.  Here, first we will learn how we can create apply a sort for the multiple column. Then we will change the sort

value.title: Sort Legend in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to Power BI Tips and Tricks Video. This is a short and sweet video demonstrating the functionality to apply Sort on Legend values in Power BI. value.title: Demystifying Custom Partitions in Power BI

Patrick takes the mystery away and walks you through how you can create them.  Partitions in tabular models https://docs.microsoft.com/analysis-services/tabular-models/partitions-ssas-tabular

value.title: Excel and OneDrive with Power BI For Collaboration
value.excerpt: In this 2 minute Tuesday, Patrick looks at how to use Excel and OneDrive with Power BI For Collaboration. Using this approach, you can easily keep Power BI updated when team members update an Excel spreadsheet hosted on OneDrive. This is a great alternative to using Google Sheets which can be painful
